data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gerken, Sarah, Watling, Les (2015): Platycuma bamberconfabulor sp. nov. (Crustacea: Cumacea: Nannastacidae) from Antarctica, with a note on the gut of Platycuma. Zootaxa 3995 (1): 133-137, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3995.1.13
